intro.paragraph: I'm a Software Developer with experience building web and mobile applications using a variety of technologies.
intro.paragraph2: My areas of interest include 3D Graphics, Low-level Programming, and Backend infrastructure. I'm also a fan of making things secure and scalable.
about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: Hey! I'm Luis. I've been programming since 2019, and have been passionate about it ever since. As a self-taught individual, I've had to learn a lot of things on my own, which has helped me develop a strong sense of autonomy and problem-solving skills.
about.paragraph2: In my free time, I like to watch animes / series and keep up with the <hover> </hover>. Sometimes I happen to play Minecraft or Resident Evil.
about.paragraph2.hover.tooltip: I'm not particularly fond of AI, but I try to keep open-minded about it given its potential
about.paragraph3: Here are some other things about me that you might want to know:
about.list1: One Piece was the first anime I ever watched and it's still my favorite.
about.list2: I use a <hover> </hover> as my daily driver but I also have a MacBook Pro M2 for iOS/macOS development.
about.list2.hover.tooltip: I've been using Fedora for a while now, although you may find me using Arch (btw) or Pop!_OS.
about.list3: I learned how to code by building Minecraft mods with Java.
about.list5: I'm always seeking to learn new things and improve <hover> </hover>.
about.list5.hover.tooltip: I don't stick to a particular technology. I'd rather learn what's necessary for the job.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.paragraph: Feel free to reach out if you want a to build something together, have a question, or just want to connect
